content: Synthesise my sources into a 1-minute video script. I'm using the idea of gardening to describe how we can be intentional in an age of AI, but I have a ton of ideas I can follow here. I just want an overall look at the philosophy of gardening and what it means, with the history and who we can be, and then have a substack article linked. i don't want the nitty gritty of how to garden, the specific values, just yet.
